mutants.code:
def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a - sharpe_ratio_b) / max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) > 0.35

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a - sharpe_ratio_b) / max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) < 0.35

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a - sharpe_ratio_b) / max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) == 0.35

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a - sharpe_ratio_b) * max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) >= 0.35

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a - sharpe_ratio_b) // max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) >= 0.35

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a - sharpe_ratio_b) / max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) >= 1.35

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a - sharpe_ratio_b) / max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) >= -0.65

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a - sharpe_ratio_b) / max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) >= 0

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a - sharpe_ratio_b) / max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) >= 1

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a - sharpe_ratio_b) / max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) >= -0.35

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a + sharpe_ratio_b) / max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) >= 0.35

def is_sharpe_ratio_significant(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b):
    """
    Determines if the difference in Sharpe Ratio between two assets is significant.
    
    Args:
    sharpe_ratio_a (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset A.
    sharpe_ratio_b (float): The Sharpe Ratio of Asset B.
    
    Returns:
    bool: Whether the difference in Sharpe Ratio is significant (i.e., 35% higher).
    """
    return abs(sharpe_ratio_a * sharpe_ratio_b) / max(sharpe_ratio_a, sharpe_ratio_b) >= 0.35
